TITLE: About Us
TEXT:
In 2020, Firastar released the first version of Firefox and Chrome extensions.The primary purpose of Firastar is to edit Persian texts and solve writing issues.
This project proudly presents itself as an open-source project. Any improvement in the direction of the progress of this project by you can be directly applied to Firstar.
The service is still at the beginning of its development and follows a long way to go to become the biggest and best Persian text editing service.
